title: Request a Quote from Multiple Suppliers
description: A buyer is sourcing a new component and needs to send a Request for Quote (RFQ) to several potential suppliers.

tasks.description: Define the RFQ, including the part specifications, required quantity, and response deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new RFQ with all necessary details.

tasks.description: Select a list of qualified suppliers to receive the RFQ.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects three qualified suppliers from the SRM system.

tasks.description: Send the RFQ to the selected suppliers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully dispatches the RFQ to all three suppliers.
